attributes.action: Open a airfield for all the car scene to use
attributes.additional_details: Cause there are bigger crimes happening all over the county but the police will be more interested in ruining a static show for car enthusiasts
attributes.background: Open a airfield off public roads for everyone in the car scene to use on a weekend to show off there bhp etc free of charge

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the use of airfields are a matter for their owners, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
